pageProps.title: spaCy-wrap
pageProps.teaser: For Wrapping fine-tuned transformers in spaCy pipelines

data.title: spaCy-wrap
data.slogan: For Wrapping fine-tuned transformers in spaCy pipelines
data.description: spaCy-wrap is a wrapper library for spaCy for including fine-tuned transformers from Huggingface in your spaCy pipeline allowing inclusion of existing models within existing workflows.
code_example: 'doc_extension_trf_data': 'clf_trf_data',  # document extention for the forward pass
'name': 'cardiffnlp/twitter-roberta-base-sentiment',  # the model name or path of huggingface model
doc = nlp('spaCy is a wonderful tool')
data.author: Kenneth Enevoldsen
